lead_paragraph: Hélio Castroneves earned his third straight pole at Watkins Glen International in New York, covering the 3.4-mile, 11-turn road circuit at 136.021 miles an hour during qualifying for the Watkins Glen Grand Prix.
snippet: Hélio Castroneves earned his third straight pole at Watkins Glen International in New York, covering the 3.4-mile, 11-turn road circuit at 136.021 miles an hour during qualifying for the Watkins Glen Grand Prix.
